text: {| |} HMS Union was a 98-gun second rate ship of the line of the Royal Navy, launched on 16 November 1811 at Plymouth. She was broken up in 1833. ==Notes== ==References== *Lavery, Brian (2003) The Ship of the Line - Volume 1: The development of the battlefleet 1650-1850. Conway Maritime Press. . Category:Ships of the line of the Royal Navy Category:Boyne-class ships of the line (1810) Category:1811 ships
title: HMS Union (1811)
